import axios from"axios";import{FETCH_USERS_FAILURE,FETCH_USERS_REQUEST,FETCH_USERS_SUCCESS}from"./userTypes";export var fetchUserRequest=function fetchUserRequest(){return{type:FETCH_USERS_REQUEST};};export var fetchUserSuccess=function fetchUserSuccess(users){return{type:FETCH_USERS_SUCCESS,payload:users};};export var fetchUserFailure=function fetchUserFailure(error){return{type:FETCH_USERS_FAILURE,payload:error};};// https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/users
export var fetchUsers=function fetchUsers(){return function(dispatch){dispatch(fetchUserRequest);axios.get(" https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/users").then(function(response){var users=response.data;dispatch(fetchUserSuccess(users));}).catch(function(error){var errorMsg=error.message;dispatch(fetchUserFailure(errorMsg));});};};
